title: 2014 Edition - Instant Immersion German Levels 1,2,3
description:
New features, more fun, and even easier to use than ever before!

Research shows that people are more successful at learning something new when they learn with a group. Now, Instant Immersion - maker of the world's most popular language-learning software - includes group-learning features to make learning a new language more fun and effective! Plus, an updated, modern interface keeps people focused on what's important: learning a new language!
